release.action: Fix wrong entry in codelists 111 and 6005
Remove wrong entries from codelist 6001 and fix 6003
Add english localisations to codelist 6010
Add new entry to bkg codelists 10003 and 10004
Fix wrong number in UVP RP Codelist 9002
Update wording in codelist 10003 and 10004
Add english translations to codelist 10003 and 10004
Fix wrong iso in codelist 5200
Update codelist 111: update some entries and add new ones.
Nokis: Add codelist 7200 for thesaurus.
Add codelists 600 and 601 for localisations.
Update codelist 111: update entries.
Add new codelist 7128: 'Datenqualität - Relative Positionsgenauigkeit - Art der Messung'.
Add new entry 'Nutzung der Daten nur nach Rücksprache mit dem Dateneigentümer' to CodeList 6500.
Fix codelist patches and adapt test.
Add MQTT protocol to operation types codelist (5180).
Add English localisation for AdV-Produktgruppe (8010), Konformität (6005), OpenData (OGDD) Categories (6400).
Change the docker container’s privilege to a non-root user.
Update Codelist 9016: add UVPG-14, 16-18.
Take ENV variable INGRID_OPTS into account.
Fix problem accessing INSPIRE registry.
Add new entry 'Mittelwasser' to Codelist 101.
Improve MD_GridSpatialRepresentation support.
Add metadata point of contact address type.
Update Codelist 9016: add UVPG-15 and UVPVB numbers.
Update Codelist 111: update provider name in entry 112 (MUEEF)
Add status information to INSPIRE registry items
Update Codelist 9006: update LUVPG SH UVP numbers.
IGE: Spezifikationsdatum bei Spezifikation der Konformität soll "2010-12-08" bei "VERORDNUNG (EG) Nr. 1089/2010..." lauten.
Fix codelist 6010: Bindestrich einfügen in "INSPIRE Richtlinie".
Fix codelist 6005 and recover lost entries
Add a job to synchronize external list to codelist 6350 (Priority Dataset)
Add importer for spatial scope from INSPIRE-registry
Update Codelist 6100: add "Katasterparzellen" to List-ID 106, swap hyphen (-) for a em dash (—) in List-ID 310
Update Codelist 6500: add/update opendata licenses (GovData)
Adapt BKG codelists
Wrong reference to UVP-18 instead of UVPG-18, resulting in display problems in the portal.
Add codelist entry to list 101.
Add new codelist entries to list 100.
BKG: Update Codelists for use constraints.
Remove INSPIRE suffix from codelist 100.
Remove BKG codelists.
Update codelist 6005.
Update UVP numbers of Saarland, codelist 9010.
Update BKG specific codelists 10003, 10004.
Update codelist 6010.
Add codelist entry to list 6500.
Add new entry to AdV-Produktgruppe.
Add new entries for WMTS operation.
Update libraries to fix security issues and adapt to log4j2.
Sort codelist entries numericaly by their ID.
Move patches to root directory to be applied in docker images when data directory is mapped.
Add BKG to provider list.
Fix codelists (1320, 6005, 6100), data was lost when codelists were separated into different files.
Backup codelists when updating codelist repo.
Update codelist 6500 - license
Fix encoding of AdV-Produktgruppe.
Add UVP Nummern of Bayern.
Codelists are now separated in each file, for better handling and updates.
Update name of codelist 6005 (conformity). Append `(INSPIRE)' to the name to differentiate it from free conformity entries list (6006).
Remove 'Kein INSPIRE-Thema' from syslist 6100 (INSPIRE-Themen).
Append new data formats to syslist 1320.
Some UVP numbers with special chars are not displayed correctly in the Editor.
Data sets could not be published because of wrong JSON Syntax in code list entries.
Ignore entry update patch if codelist does not exists.
Add UVP Nummern of NRW.
Add UVP Nummern of BW.
Fixed missing German codelist entries during patch process.
Added syslist 6010 accessConstraints to codelist repo.
Added syslists for BKG 10001-10006.
Updated language codelist with new languages.
Updated codelist entries to show which CRS is INSPIRE.
Updated codelist 6005 (conformity).
Fixed german name of INSPIRE theme to "Geografische Gittersysteme".
Remove updated codelist files once they were executed.
Fixed notification when codelist could not be written.
Added service type version "predefined ATOM".
Added UVP specific codelists (UVP numbers).
Prepare for docker deployment.
Fixed wrong path to save data when using cygwin.
Fixed codelist 6100.
Added more CRS to codelist 100.
Fixed wording of "letzte Änderung".
Updated Logo to InGrid Logo.
Update of codelist 6005 (conformity), adapted to GDI-DE.
Removal of PortalU-references.
Update of codelist 6500 (licenses), data contains now JSON format. Update of codelist 6100 (INSPIRE Themen), adapted to GDI-DE.
Improved update of codelist repository when installing a new version.
Added license header to all source files for Open Source migration.
Mapping of string to codelist entry now possible without locale and finding of codelist more flexible.
Update of Codelists and added new ones.
Use ISO values before English values for mapping "Verweistyp".
Added data field to codelist-entry.
Change behavior of some codelists to use new data field instead of separated data in entry value.
Better look (update styles).
Add java parameter "-Dfile.encoding=UTF8" to start script.
Make sure to use UTF-8 encoding when being requested (in browser directly).
Fix java heap definition in start.sh.
Fix Umlaute problem on windows, now UTF-8 encoded when initially read from file.
Fix IE problem when accessing administration page, which prevented the usage completely.

Initial version of the Codelist Repository. This webapp contains an administration interface for all central managed Codelists. Codelists can be added, deleted and modified. For each Codelist several entries can be added in different languages (also ISO). With a REST-Interface the codelists can be fetched. If called with a timestamp then only updated Codelists are returned.
